The dynamics of the curse.
The curse is not static. The only thing what it does is change Danial in some way. It can evolve, stop, even reverse when the story you make allows it. Do you want it to leak to other characters, it can. Do you want the curse to suddenly start drain other people to make Danial even bigger, go for it.
